arts.ttl: Heartbreak for Milan teenager Francesco Camarda as goal ruled out but he still sets record
arts.sum: Camarda would have become the youngest Champions League scorer at 16 years and 226 days. “It was emotional, I think the best feeling of my life but then the VAR played a trick on me,” Camarda said after the match.

arts.ttl: Christian Pulisic nets wonderful Olimpico goal for AC Milan in Champions League
arts.sum: Christian Pulisic has managed to score straight from a corner for AC Milan in this week’s Uefa Champions League. Known as an ‘Olimpico’, it is one of football’s rare delights and was the clear highlight in the first half of Tuesday night’s meeting between the Rossoneri and Club Brugge at the San Siro.
